mapper.insert: insert into tb_agent_info(mobile_no, real_name, alipay_no, agent_percent, level, parent_agent_id, user_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values ( #{mobileNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPercent, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentAgentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update tb_agent_info set real_name = #{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_no = #{alipayNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_percent = #{agentPercent, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from tb_agent_info where level >= 0
and mobile_no=#{mobileNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and real_name like CONCAT(#{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by level, gmt_created desc
SELECT count(*) from tb_agent_info where parent_agent_id=#{parentAgentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
